oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Ghāyat al-maʼmūl fī sharḥ Waraqāt al-uṣūl / taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah al-Ḥibr al-Baḥr al-Fahhāmah Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Anṣārī al-Ramlī al-Shāfiʻī : manuscript, 1613
Ghāyat al-maʼmūl fī sharḥ Waraqāt al-uṣūl
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ramlī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad , -1563 or 1564
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. First three leaves and last leaf framed within a double red line.
According to colophon (f. 66v), copy completed on 11 Jumādá al-Thānī 1022 AH [July 29, 1613 AD] in the hand of ʻAlī ibn Manṣūr al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī.
Ownership statements by: ʻAlī ibn Manṣūr al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, al-Ḥājj Yūsuf al-ʻAṭṭār, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Tabānī (?), Saʻīd ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm al-Dāghistānī.
Binding by al-Shaykh Zāhid al-ʻAṭṭār, 2 Shaʻbān 1312 AH [January 18, 1895 AD].
MS Arab 302. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
